sentences.sContent: Stop flaunting your mini-skirt, you are flaunting your underwear at the same time.
sentences.sContent_eng: Stop flaunting your mini-skirt, you are flaunting your underwear at the same time.
sentences.sCn: 别再炫耀你的迷你裙了，你连你的内裤都一起炫耀了。

sentences.sContent: Like wearing mini-skirt, sentences in speech or writing should be the shorter, the better.
sentences.sContent_eng: Like wearing mini-skirt, sentences in speech or writing should be the shorter, the better.
sentences.sCn: 也有人打趣的说：「讲演或写作的句子，就像穿迷你裙，愈短愈好。」

sentences.sContent: Lydia always comes to work in a—mini-skirt and high heels.
sentences.sContent_eng: Lydia always comes to work in a—mini-skirt and high heels.
sentences.sCn: 莉蒂雅总是穿着性感迷你裙和高跟鞋来上班。

trans.tranOther: A miniskirt is a very short skirt
